item.description:
Join us for the 2nd Annual Blue Back Square Health and Wellness Expo presented by Downtown Yoga Studios and Cycled Energy.

This event is outdoors and FREE!

*************************************************

Schedule for the day:

10 am: Multi-level yoga class (with DJ) taught by Liz Bacon of Downtown Yoga Studios

11 am – 11:30 am: Laughter Yoga with Laura Le (www.ctlaugh.com)

11:30 am: BodyConstruct class (a fat-burning, body-sculpting class) taught by Mrs. Connecticut America 2013 Lori-Ann Marchese

12 pm - 2 pm: Entertainment provided by CT Walks for Haitihttp://www.ctwalksforhaiti.org/

*************************************************

There will be 15+ health and wellness booths seeking to help you achieve your health and wellness goals, including:

-a raw food holistic health coach (Eat the Sunlight),

-a yoga clothing store (LUCY Activewear),

-massage therapists (Massage Envy),

-and skin care specialists (The Pretty Face Place).

There will also be game stations for children.

Parking is metered on street and garages. Here is parking info:http://www.westhartford.org/living_here/town_departments/public_works/special_services/municipal_parking/parking_location_rate_and_hours.php
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be around the stage between Barnes and Noble and the Pinkberry store.
item.name: Saturday: 2nd Annual Blue Back Square Health and Wellness Expo
